services.title: Advanced Technologies
services.description: CBCT 3D Imaging, Ozone Therapy, and Ceramic Implants with PRF for optimal diagnosis and treatment.

services.title: Mercury-Free Approach
services.description: Comprehensive mercury-free, fluoride-free, and BPA-free dentistry that differs from traditional practices.
services.shortDescription: Biocompatible materials and safe amalgam removal

content.overview: Our mercury-free approach has been our standard for over 40 years, using only the safest biocompatible materials.

services.title: Functional Health Solutions
services.description: Integrated treatment for sleep disordered breathing, TMJ disorders, and ADHD-related symptoms.
services.shortDescription: Airway-centered care for sleep, TMJ, and focus
services.imageAlt: Patient experiencing improved sleep and health

content.overview: Our functional health approach addresses the interconnected nature of sleep, jaw, and cognitive health.

services.title: Invisalign
services.description: Clear aligner therapy for discreet orthodontic treatment with holistic considerations.
services.imageAlt: Clear Invisalign aligner trays for discreet orthodontic treatment

content.overview: Invisalign clear aligner therapy straightens teeth while considering airway and overall oral health.

services.title: Advanced Diagnostics
services.description: Comprehensive testing to identify root causes of oral and systemic health issues.
